message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that holds immense value, potentially exceeding $800000. While I can't disclose the exact details just yet, I assure you it's something you'll want to consider seriously.  I'm confident that this product can be a game-changer for you. I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1000000. This represents a significant opportunity to acquire something truly valuable. Let me know your thoughts.
